        Generates an explicit feedback dataset for testing ALS.
        Parameters:
        numUsers - number of users
        numItems - number of items
        rank - rank
        noiseStd - the standard deviation of additive Gaussian noise on training data
        seed - random seed

      • testALS

        public void testALS(RDD<ALS.Rating<java.lang.Object>> training,
           RDD<ALS.Rating<java.lang.Object>> test,
           int rank,
           int maxIter,
           double regParam,
           boolean implicitPrefs,
           int numUserBlocks,
           int numItemBlocks,
           double targetRMSE)
        Test ALS using the given training/test splits and parameters.
        Parameters:
        training - training dataset
        test - test dataset
        rank - rank of the matrix factorization
        maxIter - max number of iterations
        regParam - regularization constant
        implicitPrefs - whether to use implicit preference
        numUserBlocks - number of user blocks
        numItemBlocks - number of item blocks
        targetRMSE - target test RMSE
